hooks.command: COMMAND=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.command' 2>/dev/null); if echo "$COMMAND" | grep -q '^git commit'; then echo '🔍 檢查 Git 提交格式...'; if ! echo "$COMMAND" | grep -qE '\[20[0-9]{6}\]'; then echo '❌ 提交格式錯誤：必須包含 [YYYYMMDD] 格式' >&2; exit 1; fi; if echo "$COMMAND" | grep -qiE '(AI|Claude|Anthropic|LLM|機器人|自動生成|Generated|Automated|Bot|Assistant|🤖)'; then echo '❌ 提交訊息包含禁止詞彙' >&2; exit 1; fi; echo '✅ Git 提交格式檢查通過'; fi; if echo "$COMMAND" | grep -qE 'ln -s'; then echo '❌ 避免創建符號連結：Google Drive 同步衝突' >&2; exit 1; fi

if [ -d "memories" ]; then mkdir -p memories/logs memories/short_term && echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'): Claude Code 對話結束" >> memories/logs/hook_$(date +%Y%m%d).log && echo "最後更新時間: $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" > memories/short_term/last_session_updated.txt && echo '🔄 記憶體系統已更新'; fi
